| HistoryText             = The Spider-Clones were a disposable army of [[Glossary:Clone|clones]] of [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] created by the [[Miles Warren (Earth-616)|Jackal]] to kill [[Benjamin Reilly (Earth-616)|Ben Reilly]].{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 404}} They pursued Ben through the Jackal's lab and into the street outside, where they were confronted by their fellow clone, [[Kaine Parker (Earth-616)|Kaine]].

Together, Ben and Kaine battled the clone army, as Ben tried futilely to reason with the clones. He and Kaine soon realized the clones were unstable, degenerating and collapsing as the battle continued. When Ben unmasked one of the dying clones, he found only a faceless mass of flesh that quickly dissolved.{{r|Spectacular Spider-Man Vol 1 227}}
